amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce appropriations in the bill by $803,270,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 111-222 to reduce appropriations in the bill by $803,270,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wittman amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 229 (Roll no. 644).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
